page.title: 09WEST BUTTERWICK SCHOOL PTA
page.content: THE P.T.A. USUALLY HOLD THEIR EVENTS ON WEDNESDAYS OR FRIDAYS.ON SATURDAY 6TH OF JULY THEY HELD A SUMMER FAYRE STARTING AT 10.30 AM.THE CHILDREN DID COUNTRY DANCING AND SINGING.THERE WERE CAKES,TOY AND PLANT STALLS,TOMBOLA AND REFRESHMENTS.IN AN HOUR AND A HALF THE P.T.A. RAISED ABOUT Â£70.WITH THE MONEY THEY HAD COLLECTED,THE P.T.A. BOUGHT COMPUTER SOFTWARE FOR THE SCHOOL.THEY HAVE ALREADY HELPED TO BUY THE COMPUTER AND DISC DRIVE,BOOKS AND A COOKER TROLLEY.THEY SPEND ABOUT Â£200 EVERY YEAR ON THE SCHOOL.THE WEST BUTTERWICK P.T.A.HAS ABOUT 17 MEMBERS THERE IS A CHAIRPERSON , TREASURER AND A SECRETARY HELPED BY A COMMITEE OF PARENTS AND TEACHERS.AS WELL AS FUND RAISING THE P.T.A. HAVE SOCIAL EVENINGS SUCH AS BINGO,CHEESE AND WINE AND CAR RALLIES.THEY HELP WITH TRIPS, FUND RAISING AND BUYING EQUIPMENT.
